root.text: I don't have time to organize all this today.
{{name}} this is the chat we use all classm8s
Why da invit8on? didnt u speak with Alex tday?

message4.text_male: Hmm, hasn't earned 2be in this group. Someone kick him out NOW!
message4.text_female: Hmm, hasn't earned 2be in this group. Someone kick her out NOW!

message5.text: The only 1 left is that freak, Mar√≠a

message6.text: Jose is the admin, talk 2morrow with him, doesnt read this chat to often

reply2.text: You treat me awful. It makes me feel bad
What have I done to you?

sad.text: I just get to school and it really feels like awful that you guys treat me like shit.

sad2.text: I'm not saying you all must like me, but all you could do is treat me with some respect.

growUp.text: Grow up, how old are you?

ask.text: I don't understand, what have I done to you to insult, ignore and make jokes about of me?

message9.text: This is not your bussiness. I can make Jose to kick you out too.

reply3.text: I hope Jose is more intelligent.

leave.text: If me being in this group chat is a problem, I'm leaving

insult.text: I hope Jose is not as stupid as you are when he reads the chat

stop.text: Stop, I haven't done anything to you that justifies the way you're treating me

goToSleep.text: I'm going to bed, see you tomorrow
